giants.title: Giants â€” The Forbidden Offspring
giants.intro: Born of Watcher and human unions, giants terrorize the earth.

entries.name: Ohya, Son of Semyaza
entries.description: The wrathful first-born of Semyaza. Plagued by nightmares of the coming deluge.

entries.name: Hahya, Brother of Ohya
entries.description: The contemplative brother who dreamt of the garden where only one tree remained.

entries.name: Mahway, the Winged
entries.description: Son of Barakel. The messenger sent to find Enoch at the ends of the earth.

entries.name: Gilgamesh
entries.description: A giant mentioned in the Dead Sea Scrolls, confused by the nightmares of his brethren.

corrupted.title: Corrupted Humanity
corrupted.intro: Those who have turned from the Creator to serve the Nephilim.

entries.name: Baal-Priest
entries.description: Priests who perform blood sacrifices to fuel dark miracles.

entries.name: Lamech the Avenger
entries.description: The Cainite king who boasted of killing a man for wounding him.
